group.label:
Worldpay Payment by Mageplaza
Worldpay is a global leader in payments processing technology and solutions for our merchant customers.
Accept credit cards and debits cards in your Magento store.

field.label: Environment
field.comment: Get account here

field.label: Merchant Country
field.comment: The country that is used by the Worldwide Payment Gateway to determine which payment methods the shopper can use.

field.label: Language Code
field.comment: ISO 639-1 language code indicating the preferred language of the shopper, where supported by the Payment Provider. Default is "EN".

field.label: Site Codes
field.comment:
Currency is the one customers choose to pay.
Settlement currency is the one the merchant receive.
With currencies not included in the site code list, the settlement currency is the default one from general configuration.

field.label: Payment from Applicable Countries
field.comment: To restrict this payment with more conditions, see Payment Restrictions module.

field.label: Debug Mode
field.comment: If Yes, diagnostic information is stored in log files on the Magento web server.

field.label: Sort Order
field.comment: Default is 0. The one with the smallest order will display first.

field.label: Payment from Applicable Countries
field.comment: To restrict this payment with more conditions, see Payment Restrictions module.

field.label: Debug Mode
field.comment: If Yes, diagnostic information is stored in log files on the Magento web server.

field.label: Sort Order
field.comment: Default is 0. The one with the smallest order will display first.
